pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Revitalising Serum Fragrance Free 50ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

REGENERIST REGENERATING SERUM FRAGRANCE-FREE

Regenerist is Olay's Advanced Anti-Ageing Collection. The supercharged Regenerist formulas, with key anti-ageing ingredients like amino-peptides, are engineered to regenerate surface skin cells and deliver visible, transformative results for younger-looking skin.

ADVANCED ANTI-AGEING FORMULA

Olay Regenerist Regenerating Serum Fragrance-Free hydrates to smooth and brighten skin. Supercharged with skin-plumping Amino-Peptide Complex II, this lightweight firming serum visibly smooths and diminishes the look of fine lines and wrinkles. In two weeks, skin renewal rate is improved for wrinkle results you can really see.

SCIENCE, INGREDIENTS, RESULTS & REGIMEN

Science: Olay analysed over 70,000 genomic samples for over 17 years and discovered that about 10% of women naturally look years younger. Inspired by this discovery, Olya re-engineered its products to help take years off your visual skin age, delivering visible, transformative results, so every woman can be ageless.

Ingredients: Re-engineered with more anti-ageing ingredients and Amino-Peptide Complex II, the ultra-lightweight Regenerating Serum helps correct the look of ageing skin and aids surface cell regeneration - giving everybody the chance to look younger, not just the 10%.

Results: 97% of women felt smoother skin after just two weeks. This lightweight anti-ageing formula is designed to deliver moisturising ingredients 10 layers deep into the skin's surface to visibly reduce the appearance of wrinkles fast.

Regimen: Regenerating Serum Fragarance-Free light gel moisturiser is the last step in your daily skincare regimen. It immediately leaves skin hydrated, so use this moisturising serum as a lightweight moisturiser. For extra hydration, apply moisturiser after to seal the moisture. Use Olay Regenerist cleansers, concentrates and treatments before applying moisturiser.

FIND THE RIGHT ADVANCED ANTI-AGEING MOISTURISER

FIND THE RIGHT COLLECTION FOR YOUR SKIN

Luminous formulas, with advanced tone-correcting ingredients like niacinamida and glycerin, are designed to visibly brighten skin and even tone.

Total Effects formulas, with nourishing ingredients like vitamins and antioxidants, give seven benefits in one to help fight signs of ageing for younger-looking skin.

ProX formulas, with ingredients like pro-retinol and amino peptides, offer proven skincare solutions to target root causes of ageing for healthy-looking skin.

The Olay Eyes Collection is specifically formulated for the delicate eye area to fight virtually every eye concern: dark circles, puffy eyes, fine lines and under eye wrinkles.

General Information

Olay Regenerist Advanced Anti-Ageing Revitalising Serum Fragrance Free is a fast absorbing, non-greasy formula that hydrates the skin and reduce lines and wrinkles to retain the skin's youthful look. Look up to 10 years younger in just 28 days!

- Refines texture, visibly reduces lines & wrinkles and hydrates for firmer skin


- Formula with advanced amino-peptide complex delivers anti-ageing ingredients into skin


- Hydra-firming Complex helps retain skin's youthful look


- Infused with the highest concentration of Regenerist's signature Amino-peptide Complex 


- Fast-absorbing, dermatologist tested and non-comedogenic (Won't clog pores)


Look up to 10 years younger in just 28 days with Olay Regenerist Advanced Anti-Ageing Revitalising Serum Fragrance Free. Its fast absorbing, non-greasy formula contains a Hydra-firming complex that helps retain the skin's youthful look. Supercharged with skin-plumping Amino-Peptide Complex II, this formula is hydrates deep into the skin's surface.

Product Claims: Look up to 10 years younger in just 4 weeks

Size: 50mL

KEY FEATURES

• Formula helps to:
Renew skin's youthful look. Deliver deep penetrating anti-aging ingredients into skin's epidermis layer. Reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with moisturisation.Exfoliate and smooth skin.
• Light-weight
• Fast-absorbing
• Fragrance-Free
• Non-Greasy





Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. Important information, do not discard outer carton.

Ingredients

Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Panthenol, Polyethylene, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dimethiconol, DMDM Hydantoin, Laureth-4, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Fruit Extract, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Laureth-7, Sodium PEG-7 Olive Oil Carboxylate, Disodium EDTA, Butylene Glycol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Allantoin, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract.

Directions

Using your fingertips, smooth evenly onto clean skin over face and neck, once or twice a day. Use alone, or before applying moisturiser or foundation make-up.

USAGE ADVICE

Choose from among the following regimen steps from Regenerist:
1. Cleanser: Designed to gently remove dirt and make-up leaving skin purified and prepared for the rest of your routine.
2. Serum/Essence: Designed to be lightweight so they can be layered on the skin before your traditional moisturiser. Easily absorbs and delivers anti-aging ingredients into skin's epidermis layer.
3. Moisturiser: Designed for long-lasting hydration and offered in 3 types - Day, UV, and Night.
4. Eye/Treatment: Eye: Use after your moisturiser to hydrate the eye area and address key eye concerns.
Treatments: Specially designed with advanced ingredients/technology to treat specific skin concerns. Add these to further customise your skincare regimen.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
